name: Containment Kerfuffle
description:
A 1-5 player action cooperative experience. Humanity has continued to leak toxins into the wild and a wild monster has arisen to rule the world.

An Xbox controller is required to play the game. The Xbox controller player will be the body of the monster, while up to four friends can join the mayhem on their mobile phones as the four tentacles.

Fling the tentacles around to crush stuff shout at the body to go find things to crush.

The link for the mobile players to join can found in the game and here:
http://149.210.145.133:5000

The players on phones do not need to be on the same network as the computer running the game, a 4G data connection is perfectly fine to play with.

When joining, if the tentacle isn't facing the correct way, just turn the phone around so you can see it.
